page.title: 20Employment for Barnt Green
page.content: In our survey of the{occupations}of the people of Barnt Green, Cofton Hackett and Hopwood we found out lots of interesting things. The shops, offices and services in Barnt Green employed a lot of people but only a small proportion lived in the village. Most of the working population travel by car towards the connurbation of Birmingham. some use the train for their transport. Nearby towns such as Redditch and Bromsgrove provide{employment}for the villagers also. The average journey to work was 8km. The vast majority of the people questioned liked their jobs.
